mapper.select: SELECT outbound.outbound_id,outbound.sale_id,outbound.staff_id,staff.staff_name,outbound.customer_id,customer.customer_name,outbound.time, shipment_id,outbound_product.product_id,product.product_name,num FROM product,sales_order,staff,customer,(outbound left join outbound_product on outbound.outbound_id=outbound_product.outbound_id) where outbound.sale_id=sales_order.sale_id and outbound.sale_id=#{saleId} and product.product_id=outbound_product.product_id and outbound.staff_id=staff.staff_id and outbound.customer_id=customer.customer_id and outbound.effective=true and sales_order.effective=true

SELECT outbound.outbound_id,outbound.sale_id,outbound.staff_id,staff.staff_name,outbound.customer_id,customer.customer_name,outbound.time, shipment_id,outbound_product.product_id,product.product_name,num FROM product,sales_order,staff,customer,(outbound left join outbound_product on outbound.outbound_id=outbound_product.outbound_id) where outbound.sale_id=sales_order.sale_id and date(outbound.time)=date(#{time}) and product.product_id=outbound_product.product_id and outbound.staff_id=staff.staff_id and outbound.customer_id=customer.customer_id and outbound.effective=true and sales_order.effective=true
